title: Saudi government opens doors of Roza-e-Rasool for PM Shehbaz Sharif
content:
MADINA MUNAWARA April 29, (APP): The government of Saudi Arabia Friday night opened the door of Roza e Rasool (PBUH) for Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and his delegation.
The Prime Minister along with his delegation went inside the Roza e Rasool and recited Darood o Salam.
The Prime Minister also offered fateha at the resting places of Hazrat Abu Bakar Siddique (RA) and Hazrat Umar Farooq (RA).
